name: 2023 8th International Conference on Image, Vision and Computing
content: Conference Publication: Accepted papers will be included in ICIVC 2023 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore , and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services. ICIVC 2023 is listed in IEEE Official Conference Calendar: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/58118 \*\*Journal Recommendation: Expert Systems will publish an extended version of the conference's most top conference papers, at least 30% of a new content based on the original proceedings paper.
